site.headScript:
<script>
  const images = document.querySelectorAll('.image-container img');
  
  images.forEach((image) => {
    image.addEventListener('click', () => {
      image.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth', block: 'center' });
    });
  });
</script>

elements.innerHtml:
Likha Studios,
Your #1 Digital Partner

We want more for you,
let's build your brand.

Hey there! We totally get it—managing and creating an online presence can be a real pain.

It's like juggling digital marketing, branding, content creation, and social media management all at once! And with new platforms popping up left and right, it can feel like a never-ending challenge to keep up and stand out in the online world.

Whether you're an individual or a business, we're here to take that hassle off your plate. Let us be your guide on this crazy journey of building and maintaining a killer online presence.
What we offer, just for you.(or your business)

Social Media
Services

Learn More

Email and
Branding

Learn More

Website Development

Learn More

Why Choose Us?

Likha means to create. And we create opportunities for everyone to thrive in the digital world.

Likha is for everyone - because your dreams deserve to be brought to life.

We empower you to build your brand and create a lasting impression.

We're not just true to our brand, we're true to your vision - because authenticity matters.

We're not just here to help, we're here to make your journey easy and to bring your vision to life, one click at a time.

Not only that, we're also fast.

Powered by the world's best services, we ensure our quality meets the industry standard to provide you the very best— of the best.

With precise planning, our process is the most efficient. If building a website takes 7 days, we can give you a draft in 2.⁰

Learn how we utilize these services ➤

Learn something new, everyday.

"Learning is not a one-time event; it is a lifelong journey that unfolds every single day. It is in the smallest moments, the tiniest discoveries, and the continuous pursuit of knowledge that we truly grow and evolve."


Visit our Blog

Let's learn more about you,
connect with us.

connect[at]getlikha[dot]com

Live Chat

Call Us

Learn why we use [at] and [dot] ➤
Contact Box
Home
Blog
Services
About Us
Connect with Us
Our Socials.
"Likha Studios" is a registered business in Atlantic Canada.

Our Proud Partners.

Lakbay CA

It takes an average of
7 days to create a website.

Why spend time and effort into building your own website when you can prioritize your core business functions?

Allow us to handle the website creation process efficiently and effectively, delivering results faster than if done alone.

Let's get Social.

Managing multiple social media profiles across various platforms, ensuring consistent branding, and focusing on visibility can be a daunting task. It's time-consuming and takes away valuable time that could be better spent growing your business.

Let us handle the complexities of social media, so you can focus on what you do best.

Business Package Includes:

Static Website Development

Custom Website Animations

Unique, Fluid and Neat Website Design

On-Site SEO

Stratigically Placed Content

AI-Powered Content

On-Demand and Frequent Analytics Report for all platforms

Starts at $49.99/month

Includes:

Social Media Setup Help for Beginners

Custom Instructions for Training

Additional Social Media Branding Resources

Custom PDF Handbook for future reference

Included in Business Package

We want more for you.
Let's build your Brand.

Looking to upgrade your email game? We've got you covered! Say goodbye to generic email addresses like [at]gmail[dot]com or [at]icloud[dot]com.

With us, you can rock a customized [at]yourbusiness[dot]com*, adding a professional touch to your communication. Let us handle the technical side while you focus on building your brand!

Includes:

Either Basic Email Redirect or a Custom Mail Inbox

Custom Instructions for Training

Live Support for Email Problems

Cloudflare Protection for Emails

Included in Business Package

Want more?
Here's our extra Services.

Need more from the #1 Digital Studio? We offer additional services that fit under Digital Marketing, all for you.

Poster Making

We also offer Digital and Printed Poster Making services to help market you.

Starts at $10/poster

Image Manipulation

We can also "Photoshop" your images to make them better and well-suited for your desired output.

Starts at $15/image

Game Development

Want to create a promotional video game on your site? We can figure something out for you!

Starts at $299/project

Likha means to create.

At Likha Studios, we believe in the power of creation. Likha, which means "create" in Tagalog, perfectly embodies our mission to empower individuals, businesses, and communities to thrive in the digital world.

We understand the challenges that come with navigating the ever-evolving landscape of the online realm. That's why we are here to guide you every step of the way. Our team is dedicated to creating opportunities for success.

Our Mission.

At Likha Studios, our vision is to empower small individuals to businesses of any scale to achieve their full potential by creating a strong and digital presence.

We strive to connect our clients with their target audience, bridging the gap between them and their customers. Our ultimate goal is to build a community where small businesses can thrive and grow together, while helping them reach their fullest potential in the digital world.

Our Vision.

We are committed to providing exceptional digital solutions to anyone looking to establish their presence online. By offering affordable solutions, without cutting corners, we can help them establish their presence online.
In other words, we want to help you.
Our Proud Partners.
